00066 class EGS_LOCAL EGS_InputPrivate {
00067 public:
00068     string        key;
00069     string        value;
00070     vector<EGS_InputPrivate *> children;
00071     int nref;
00072 
00073     EGS_InputPrivate() : nref(0) {};
00074     EGS_InputPrivate(const string &Key, const string &Val = "") : key(Key),
00075       value(Val), children(), nref(0) { };
00076     EGS_InputPrivate(const EGS_InputPrivate &p, bool deep=false) :
00077         key(p.key), value(p.value), nref(0), children() {
00078         for(unsigned int j=0; j<p.children.size(); j++) {
00079             if( deep )
00080                 children.push_back(new EGS_InputPrivate(*p.children[j],deep));
00081             else {
00082                 children.push_back(p.children[j]);
00083                 children[j]->nref++;
00084             }
00085         }
00086     }
00087 
00088     ~EGS_InputPrivate() {
00089         for(unsigned int j=0; j<children.size(); j++)
00090             deleteItem(children[j]);
00091     };
00092 
00093     int replace(const string &replace_what, const string &replace_with);
00094 
00095     int setContentFromFile(const char *fname);
00096     int setContentFromString(string &input);
00097     int setContent(istream &input);
00098 
00099     int addContentFromFile(const char *fname);
00100     int addContentFromString(string &input);
00101     int addContent(istream &input);
00102 
00103     void processInputLoop(EGS_InputPrivate *p);
00104 
00105     void addItem(EGS_InputPrivate *p) {
00106         p->nref++; children.push_back(p);
00107     };
00108 
00109     EGS_InputPrivate *takeInputItem(const string &key, bool self=true) {
00110         if( self && isA(key) ) return this;
00111         for(vector<EGS_InputPrivate *>::iterator it=children.begin();
00112                 it != children.end(); it++) {
00113             if( compareKeys((*it)->key,key) ) {
00114                 EGS_InputPrivate *res = *it;
00115                 children.erase(it); return res;
00116             }
00117             //if( (*it)->key == key ) {
00118             //    EGS_InputPrivate *res = *it;
00119             //    children.erase(it); return res;
00120             //}
00121         }
00122         return 0;
00123     };
00124 
00125     EGS_InputPrivate *getInputItem(const string &Key) {
00126         if( isA(Key) ) return this;
00127         for(unsigned int j=0; j<children.size(); j++)
00128             if( compareKeys(children[j]->key,Key) ) return children[j];
00129         return 0;
00130     };
00131 
00132     bool isA(const string &Key) const {
00133         return compareKeys(key,Key);
00134     };
00135 
00136     static void removeComment(const string &start, const string &end,
00137             string &input, bool newline);
00138 
00139     static int findStart(int start, int stop,
00140                   const string &start_key, const string &end_key,
00141                   const string &input, string &what, int &end);
00142     static int findStop(int start, const string &start_string,
00143                  const string &end_string, const string &input, int &ie);
00144 
00145     static bool compareKeys(const string &s1, const string &s2);
00146 
00147     void print(int nind, ostream &) const;
00148 
00149     void removeEmptyLines(string &input);
00150 
00151     static void deleteItem(EGS_InputPrivate *p) {
00152         if( p ) {
00153             if( !p->nref ) delete p; else p->nref--;
00154         }
00155     };
00156 
00157 };
00158 #endif

00162 EGS_Input::EGS_Input(const EGS_Input &input) {

00164     else p = 0;

00193 EGS_Input *EGS_Input::takeInputItem(const string &key, bool self) {
00194     if( !p ) return 0;
00195     EGS_InputPrivate *item = p->takeInputItem(key,self);
00196     if( !item ) return 0;
00197     if( item == p && !self ) return 0;
00198     EGS_Input *result = new EGS_Input; result->p = item;
00199     if( item == p ) p = 0;
00200     return result;
00201 }
00202 
00203 EGS_Input *EGS_Input::getInputItem(const string &key) const {
00204     if( !p ) return 0;
00205     EGS_InputPrivate *item = p->getInputItem(key);
00206     if( !item ) return 0;
00207     item->nref++; EGS_Input *result = new EGS_Input; result->p = item;
00208     return result;
00209 }

00211 void EGS_Input::addInputItem(const EGS_Input &input) {
00212     if( !input.p ) return;
00213     if( !p ) p = new EGS_InputPrivate(*input.p);
00214     else p->addItem(input.p);
00215 }

00217 const char *EGS_Input::name() const {
00218     if( !p ) return 0;
00219     return p->key.c_str();

00222 bool EGS_Input::isA(const string &key) const {
00223     if( !p ) return false;
00224     return p->isA(key);

00226 
00227 template <class T> int EGS_LOCAL
00228 get_input(const EGS_InputPrivate *p, const string &key, vector<T> &values) {
00229     if( !p ) return -1;
00230     const EGS_InputPrivate *p1;
00231     if( !p->children.size() ) {
00232         if( !p->isA(key) ) return -1;
00233         p1 = p;
00234     }
00235     else {
00236         for(unsigned int j=0; j<p->children.size(); j++) {
00237             p1 = p->children[j];
00238             if( p1->isA(key) ) break;
00239             p1 = 0;
00240         }
00241         if( !p1 ) return -1;
00242     }
00243     values.erase(values.begin(),values.end());
00244     S_STREAM in(p1->value.c_str());
00245     int error = 0;
00246     while ( 1 ) {
00247         T tmp; in >> tmp;
00248         if( !in.fail() ) values.push_back(tmp);
00249         if( in.eof() ) {
00250             if( values.size() <= 0) error = 1;
00251             break;
00252         }
00253         if( !in.good() ) {
00254             if( values.size() <= 0) error = 2;
00255             break;
00256         }
00257     }
00258     return error;
00259 }

00262     return get_input(p,key,values);

00272 
00273 template <class T> int EGS_LOCAL
00274 get_input(const EGS_InputPrivate *p, const string &key, T &value) {
00275     if( !p ) return -1;
00276     const EGS_InputPrivate *p1;
00277     if( !p->children.size() ) {
00278         if( !p->isA(key) ) return -1;
00279         p1 = p;
00280     }
00281     else {
00282         for(unsigned int j=0; j<p->children.size(); j++) {
00283             p1 = p->children[j];
00284             if( p1->isA(key) ) break;
00285             p1 = 0;
00286         }
00287         if( !p1 ) return -1;
00288     }
00289     S_STREAM in(p1->value.c_str());
00290     T tmp; in >> tmp;
00291     if( !in.fail() ) { value = tmp; return 0; }
00292     return 1;
00293 }
00294 
00295 int EGS_Input::getInput(const string &key, string &value) const {
00296     vector<string> v;
00297     //int err = get_input(p,key,v);
00298     int err = getInput(key,v);
00299     if( err ) return err;
00300     value = v[0];
00301     for(unsigned int j=1; j<v.size(); j++) {
00302         value += " "; value += v[j];
00303     }
00304     return 0;
00305 }

00322 
00323 // If the stupid MS compiler would support the >> operator on 64 bit
00324 // integers, we would just use the template as in the other functions.
00325 // But as it doesn't, we need a separate implementation (which is pretty
00326 // simple-minded, but it should do for now).
00327 int EGS_Input::getInput(const string &key, EGS_I64 &value) const {
00328     vector<string> aux;
00329     int err = getInput(key,aux); if( err ) return err;
00330     if( aux.size() > 1 ) return 1;
00331     if( aux[0].size() < 10 ) {
00332         // if it is less than 10 chars long, it is guaranteed to be
00333         // less then 1e9 => will fit into a 32 bit integer.
00334         int n; err = getInput(key,n); if( err ) return err;
00335         value = n; return 0;
00336     }
00337     int nfirst = 0; bool neg = false;
00338     if( aux[0][0] == '+' ) nfirst = 1;
00339     else if( aux[0][0] == '-' ) { nfirst = 1; neg = true; };
00340     EGS_I64 fac=1, res = 0;
00341     for(int j=aux[0].size()-1; j>=nfirst; j--) {
00342         if( !isdigit(aux[0][j]) ) return 2;
00343         EGS_I64 c = aux[0][j]-48; res += c*fac; fac *= 10;
00344     }
00345     if( neg ) res *= (-1); value = res; return 0;
00346 }
00347 
00348 
00349 int EGS_Input::getInput(const string &key, const vector<string> &allowed,
00350         int def, bool *found) const {
00351     string res; int err = getInput(key,res);
00352     if( !err ) {
00353         for(unsigned int j=0; j<allowed.size(); j++) {
00354             if( EGS_InputPrivate::compareKeys(res,allowed[j]) ) {
00355                 if( found ) *found = true; return j;
00356             }
00357         }
00358     }
00359     if( found ) *found = false;
00360     return def;
00361 }

00370 int EGS_InputPrivate::addContentFromFile(const char *fname) {
00371     // the following removes white space at the beginning of file names,
00372     // which may come from the file name being defined in an "include file"
00373     // key-value pair
00374     const char *s = fname;
00375     while( isspace(*s) && (*s) ) ++s;
00376     ifstream in(s);
00377     if( !in ) return -1;
00378     return addContent(in);
00379 }

00383     return setContent(in);
00384 }

00386 int EGS_InputPrivate::addContentFromString(string &input) {

00390 
00391 void EGS_InputPrivate::removeComment(const string &start, const string &end,
00392         string &input, bool newline) {
00393     string::size_type spos=0, epos=0;
00394     while( (epos = input.find(end,spos)) < input.size() ) {
00395         spos = input.find(start,spos);
00396         if( spos < epos ) {
00397             string::size_type len = epos - spos;
00398             if( !newline ) len += end.size();
00399             input.erase(spos,len);
00400             if( newline ) spos += end.size();
00401         } else spos = epos+1;
00402     }
00403 }
00404 
00405 int EGS_InputPrivate::setContent(istream &in) {
00406     for(unsigned int j=0; j<children.size(); j++) delete children[j];
00407     children.erase(children.begin(),children.end());
00408     return addContent(in);
00409 }
00410 
00411 bool EGS_InputPrivate::compareKeys(const string &s1, const string &s2) {
00412     string t1, t2; unsigned int j;
00413     for(j=0; j<s1.size(); j++)
00414         if( !isspace(s1[j]) ) t1 += ::toupper(s1[j]);
00415     for(j=0; j<s2.size(); j++)
00416         if( !isspace(s2[j]) ) t2 += ::toupper(s2[j]);
00417     return ( t1 == t2 );
00418 
00419 }

00421 #ifdef INPUT_DEBUG
00422 #include <iostream>
00423 #endif
00424 
00425 int EGS_InputPrivate::replace(const string &replace_what,
00426         const string &replace_with) {
00427     string::size_type pos = 0; int nr = 0;
00428     while( (pos = key.find(replace_what,pos)) < key.size() ) {
00429         key.replace(pos,replace_what.size(),replace_with); ++nr;
00430     }
00431     pos = 0;
00432     while( (pos = value.find(replace_what,pos)) < value.size() ) {
00433         value.replace(pos,replace_what.size(),replace_with); ++nr;
00434     }
00435     for(int j=0; j<children.size(); j++)
00436         nr += children[j]->replace(replace_what,replace_with);
00437     return nr;
00438 }
00439 #endif

00522 class EGS_LOCAL EGS_InputLoopVariable {
00523 public:
00524     bool is_list;
00525     string vname,
00526            vr;   
00527     char buf[128];
00528     EGS_InputLoopVariable(const string &var) : vname(var), is_list(false) {
00529         vr = "$("; vr += vname; vr += ")";
00530     };
00531     virtual ~EGS_InputLoopVariable() {};
00532     const char* getVarNameReplacement() const { return vr.c_str(); };
00533     const char* getVarReplacement() const { return buf; };
00534     virtual void setVarReplacement(int) = 0;
00535     static EGS_InputLoopVariable *getInputLoopVariable(const char *input);
00536 };
00537 
00542 class EGS_LOCAL EGS_IntegerInputLoopVariable : public EGS_InputLoopVariable {
00543 public:
00544     int vmin, vdelta;
00545     EGS_IntegerInputLoopVariable(int  Vmin, int Vdelta, const string &var) :
00546         EGS_InputLoopVariable(var), vmin(Vmin), vdelta(Vdelta) {};
00547     void setVarReplacement(int i) {
00548         int v = vmin + vdelta*i;
00549         sprintf(buf,"%d",v);
00550     };
00551 };
00552 
00557 class EGS_LOCAL EGS_FloatInputLoopVariable : public EGS_InputLoopVariable {
00558 public:
00559     double vmin, vdelta;
00560     string format;
00561     EGS_FloatInputLoopVariable(double Vmin, double Vdel, const string &var, const string &Format) :
00562         EGS_InputLoopVariable(var), vmin(Vmin), vdelta(Vdel), format(Format) {};
00563     void setVarReplacement(int i) {
00564         double v = vmin + vdelta*i;
00565         sprintf(buf,format.c_str(),v);
00566     };
00567 };
00568 class EGS_LOCAL EGS_ListInputLoopVariable : public EGS_InputLoopVariable {
00569 public:
00570     vector<string> list;
00571     EGS_ListInputLoopVariable(vector<string> List, const string &var) :
00572         EGS_InputLoopVariable(var), list(List) {is_list = true;};
00573     void setVarReplacement(int i) {
00574         string str = list[i];
00575         sprintf(buf,"%s",str.c_str());
00576     };
00577     int list_size(){return list.size();}
00578 };
00579 EGS_InputLoopVariable* EGS_InputLoopVariable::getInputLoopVariable(
00580         const char *input) {
00581     if( !input ) return 0;
00582     S_STREAM in(input);
00583     string name; int type; in >> type >> name;
00584     if( in.fail() || !in.good() ) {
00585         egsWarning("Failed reading type and name from %s\n",input); return 0;
00586     }
00587     if( type < 0 || type > 2 ) {
00588         egsFatal("Invalid loop type in input: %s\n"
00589                  "Only integer [0], float [1] and list [2] are valid types!\n",
00590                  input);
00591     }
00592     EGS_InputLoopVariable *result;
00593     if( type == 0 ) {
00594         int vmin, vdelta; in >> vmin >> vdelta;
00595         result = new EGS_IntegerInputLoopVariable(vmin,vdelta,name);
00596     }
00597     else if( type == 1 ){
00598         double vmin, vdelta; in >> vmin >> vdelta;
00599         string format; in >> format;
00600         if (format.empty()) {
00601             format = "%lg";
00602             if (in.fail()) in.clear();
00603         }
00604         result = new EGS_FloatInputLoopVariable(vmin,vdelta,name,format);
00605     }
00606     else if( type == 2 ){
00607         vector<string> vstr; string str, s_tmp;
00608         while(!in.eof()){in >> s_tmp; if (!in.fail()) vstr.push_back(s_tmp);}
00609         result = new EGS_ListInputLoopVariable(vstr,name);
00610         if( in.fail() && in.eof() ) {// possibly white spaces at end of line
00611           if (!vstr.size()){// end-of-line reached and no list-item found
00612             delete result; result = 0;
00613             egsFatal("No list-items found reading loop-input: %s\n",input);
00614           }
00615           //Found white spaces at the end of loop-input list which is ok.
00616           return result;
00617         }
00618         if( in.bad() ) {
00619           delete result; result = 0;
00620           egsFatal("Fatal error reading loop input list from %s\n",input);
00621         }
00622     }
00623     if( in.fail() ) {
00624         egsWarning("Failed reading vmin vdelta from %s\n",input);
00625         delete result; result = 0;
00626     }
00627     return result;
00628 }
00629 
00630 #ifndef SKIP_DOXYGEN
00631 void EGS_InputPrivate::processInputLoop(EGS_InputPrivate *p) {
00632     egsWarning("Processing input loop\n");
00633     EGS_InputPrivate *ic = p->takeInputItem("loop count");
00634     if( !ic ) {
00635         egsWarning("processInputLoop: no 'loop count' input\n"); return;
00636     }
00637     int nloop = -1; int err = get_input(ic,"loop count",nloop);
00638     delete ic;
00639     if( err || nloop < 1 ) {
00640         egsWarning("processInputLoop: got %d for loop count, expecting 1 or "
00641                 "more\n",nloop); return;
00642     }
00643     EGS_InputPrivate *iv; vector<EGS_InputLoopVariable *> ivars;
00644     while( (iv = p->takeInputItem("loop variable")) != 0 ) {
00645         EGS_InputLoopVariable *v =
00646             EGS_InputLoopVariable::getInputLoopVariable(iv->value.c_str());
00647         if (v->is_list){
00648            if (((EGS_ListInputLoopVariable*)v)->list_size()<nloop){
00649             egsFatal("procesInputLoop: loop size (%d) larger than list size (%d)!\n"
00650                      "This will cause a segmentation fault error, aborting ....\n",
00651             nloop, ((EGS_ListInputLoopVariable*)v)->list_size());
00652            }
00653         }
00654         if( !v ) egsWarning("processInputLoop: failed to create loop variable"
00655               " based on the input %s\n",iv->value.c_str());
00656         else ivars.push_back(v);
00657         delete iv;
00658     }
00659     if( !ivars.size() ) {
00660         egsWarning("processInputLoop: no loop variables\n"); return;
00661     }
00662     int nvar = ivars.size(); int j;
00663     /*
00664     for(j=0; j<p->children.size(); j++) {
00665         for(int iloop=0; iloop<nloop; iloop++) {
00666             EGS_InputPrivate *pnew = new EGS_InputPrivate(*p->children[j],true);
00667             for(int ivar=0; ivar<nvar; ivar++) {
00668                 ivars[ivar]->setVarReplacement(iloop);
00669                 pnew->replace(ivars[ivar]->getVarNameReplacement(),
00670                         ivars[ivar]->getVarReplacement());
00671             }
00672             children.push_back(pnew);
00673         }
00674     }
00675     */
00676     for(int iloop=0; iloop<nloop; iloop++) {
00677         for(j=0; j<p->children.size(); j++) {
00678             EGS_InputPrivate *pnew = new EGS_InputPrivate(*p->children[j],true);
00679             for(int ivar=0; ivar<nvar; ivar++) {
00680                 ivars[ivar]->setVarReplacement(iloop);
00681                 pnew->replace(ivars[ivar]->getVarNameReplacement(),
00682                               ivars[ivar]->getVarReplacement());
00683             }
00684             children.push_back(pnew);
00685         }
00686     }
00687 
00688     for(j=0; j<ivars.size(); j++) delete ivars[j];
00689 }
00690 
00691 int EGS_InputPrivate::addContent(istream &in) {
00692     string input;
00693     bool last_was_space = false;
00694     while( 1 ) {
00695         char c; in.get(c); if( in.eof() || !in.good() ) break;
00696         bool take_it = true;
00697         if( isspace(c) ) {
00698             if( last_was_space && c != '\n' ) take_it = false;
00699             last_was_space = true;
00700         } else last_was_space = false;
00701         if( take_it ) input += c;
00702     }
00703     removeComment("#","\n",input,true);
00704     removeComment("!","\n",input,true);
00705     removeComment("//","\n",input,true);
00706     removeComment("/*","*/",input,false);
00707     removeEmptyLines(input);
00708     int res = 0;
00709     vector<string> start_keys, stop_keys;
00710     int p = 0; int ep = input.size(); string what; int ie;
00711     while( (p=findStart(p,ep,start_key_begin,start_key_end,input,what,ie))>=0 ){
00712         string the_start = start_key_begin; string the_end = stop_key_begin;
00713         for(int j=0; j<what.size(); j++) {
00714             char c = ::toupper(what[j]);
00715             if( !isspace(c) ) { the_start += c; the_end += c; }
00716         }
00717         the_start += start_key_end; the_end += stop_key_end;
00718         int p1;
00719         int ep = findStop(ie+1,the_start,the_end,input,p1);
00720         if( ep > ie+1 ) {
00721             EGS_InputPrivate *ip = new EGS_InputPrivate(what);
00722             string content;
00723             content.assign(input,ie+1,p1-ie-1);
00724             input.erase(p,ep-p);
00725             ip->setContentFromString(content);
00726             if( ip->isA("input loop") ) {
00727                 processInputLoop(ip); delete ip;
00728             }
00729             else children.push_back(ip);
00730         }
00731         else {
00732             egsWarning("No matching stop delimeter for %s\n",what.c_str());
00733             return -1;
00734         }
00735     }
00736     p = 0; string::size_type p1;
00737     while( (p1=input.find('\n',p)) < input.size() ) {
00738         int j=p1;
00739         while( --j > p && isspace(input[j]) );
00740         if( j > p ) {
00741             if( input[j] == ',' || input[j] == '\\' ) {
00742                 input[p1] = ' '; input[j] = ' ';
00743             }
00744         }
00745         p = p1+1;
00746     }
00747     p=0;
00748     while( (p1=input.find('\n',p)) < input.size() ) {
00749         string::size_type p2 = input.find('=',p);
00750         if( p2 < p1 ) {
00751             string what; what.assign(input,p,p2-p);
00752             string value; value.assign(input,p2+1,p1-p2-1);
00753             for(int j=0; j<value.size(); j++)
00754                 if( value[j] == ',' ) value[j] = ' ';
00755             if( compareKeys(what,"includefile") ) {
00756                 int res = addContentFromFile(value.c_str());
00757                 if( res ) egsWarning("EGS_Input: failed to add content from "
00758                    "include file %s\n",value.c_str());
00759             }
00760             else {
00761                 EGS_InputPrivate *ip = new EGS_InputPrivate(what,value);
00762                 children.push_back(ip);
00763             }
00764         }
00765         p = p1+1;
00766     }
00767 
00768 #ifdef INPUT_DEBUG
00769     print(0,std::cout);
00770 #endif
00771 
00772     return 0;
00773 
00774 }
00775 
00776 int EGS_InputPrivate::findStop(int start, const string &the_start,
00777                                const string &the_end, const string &input,
00778                                int &ie) {
00779     int ns=0, ne=0; int have_start=1, have_end=0;
00780     int end_started = start;
00781     for(int j=start; j<input.size(); j++) {
00782         if( !isspace(input[j]) ) {
00783             char c = ::toupper(input[j]);
00784             if( the_start[ns] == c ) ns++;
00785             else { ns=0; if( the_start[ns] == c ) ns++; }
00786             if( ns == the_start.size() ) {
00787                 ns=0; have_start++;
00788             }
00789             if( !ne ) end_started = j;
00790             if( the_end[ne] == c ) ne++;
00791             else {
00792                 ne=0;
00793                 if ( the_end[ne] == c ) {
00794                     end_started = j; ne++;
00795                 }
00796             }
00797             if( ne == the_end.size() ) {
00798                 ne = 0; have_end++;
00799                 if( have_end == have_start ) {
00800                     ie = end_started; return j;
00801                 }
00802                 end_started = j+1;
00803             }
00804         }
00805     }
00806     return -1;
00807 }
00808 
00809 int EGS_InputPrivate::findStart(int start, int stop, const string &start_key,
00810                                 const string &end_key, const string &input,
00811                                 string &what, int &end) {
00812     string::size_type pos = start; unsigned int ns=0;
00813     while(1) {
00814         if( pos >= stop ) return -1;
00815         char c = ::toupper(input[pos++]);
00816         if( start_key[ns] == c ) ns++;
00817         else {
00818             ns=0; if( start_key[ns] == c ) ns++;
00819         }
00820         if( ns == start_key.size() ) break;
00821     }
00822     string::size_type epos = input.find(end_key,pos);
00823     if( epos < stop ) {
00824         what.assign(input,pos,epos-pos);
00825         end = epos + end_key.size();
00826         return pos-start_key.size();
00827     }
00828     return -2;
00829 }
00830 
00831 void EGS_InputPrivate::print(int indent, ostream &out) const {
00832     if( children.size() > 0 ) {
00833         if( key.size() > 0 ) {
00834             for(int j=0; j<indent; j++) out << indent_space;
00835             out << start_key_begin << " " << key << start_key_end << endl;
00836         }
00837         indent += 1;
00838         for(int i=0; i<children.size(); i++) children[i]->print(indent,out);
00839         indent -= 1;
00840         if( key.size() > 0 ) {
00841             for(int j=0; j<indent; j++) out << indent_space;
00842             out << stop_key_begin << " " << key << stop_key_end << endl;
00843         }
00844     } else {
00845         for(int j=0; j<indent; j++) out << indent_space;
00846         out << key << " = " << value << endl;
00847     }
00848 }
00849 
00850 void EGS_InputPrivate::removeEmptyLines(string &input) {
00851     int pos=0, pos1;
00852     while( (pos1=input.find('\n',pos)) < input.size() ) {
00853         if( pos1 == pos ) input.erase(pos,1);
00854         else {
00855             bool is_only_space = true;
00856             for(int j=pos; j<pos1; j++) {
00857                 if( !isspace(input[j]) ) {
00858                     is_only_space = false; break;
00859                 }
00860             }
00861             if( is_only_space ) input.erase(pos,pos1+1-pos);
00862             else pos = pos1+1;
00863         }
00864     }
00865 }
00866 #endif
00867 
00868 bool EGS_Input::compare(const string &s1, const string &s2) {
00869     return EGS_InputPrivate::compareKeys(s1,s2);
00870 }
00871 
00872 void EGS_Input::print(int nind,ostream &out) {
00873     if( p ) p->print(nind,out);
00874 }

00885 void egs_warning(const char *msg,...) {
00886     va_list ap; va_start( ap, msg );
00887     vfprintf( stderr, msg, ap );
00888     va_end(ap);
00889 }
00890 
00891 EGS_InfoFunction egsWarning = egs_warning;
00892 
00893 int main() {
00894

00896     p.setContent(cin);

00898     return 0;
00899 }
